intro: Stereosanthus souliei, commonly known as the Chinese star jasmine, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Oleaceae family and is characterized by its fragrant, star-shaped white flowers. The plant has opposite, simple leaves that are usually elliptical in shape. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value and pleasant aroma. Stereosanthus souliei thrives in well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight.
